ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.1_0: if he has sexual intercourse with a number of almsbowls, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.2_0: he commits two offenses entailing acknowledgment:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.3_0: they may be failure in morality ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.2_0: If a nun, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, one foot-stool, an offense entailing expulsion, and one is a condition for four months.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.11:3.1_0: The third sub-chapter on failures is finished.
